item.title: Functional Kotlin with Arrow by Karin-Aleksandra Monoid
item.description: The July Brighton Kotlin meetup takes place on Thursday 22nd July at 6 pm GMT. We will be opening the zoom just before 6pm for people to gather and chat. We’ll be welcoming Karin-Aleksandra Monoid who will be talking about Functional Kotlin with Arrow: What is a monad? Do I need a PhD to write in functional style? How do I do that in Kotlin? And other questions that you were afraid to ask.
